thread.title: Breakfast chain Snooze opening in Ahwatukee
thread.title_full: Breakfast chain Snooze opening in Ahwatukee

author: Steven Totten
title: Breakfast chain Snooze opening in Ahwatukee
text: Snooze is opening in Ahwatukee. Provided by Snooze/Debby Wolvos Ahwatukee is getting a new restaurant. Denver-based breakfast concept Snooze, an A.M. eatery, is planning to open at the Ahwatukee Foothills Towne Center at 4901 E. Ray Road , slated for September or October. Snooze is opening in Ahwatukee. Provided by Snooze/Debby Wolvos The new location will be the fifth Valley location for the restaurant chain, and will seat 147 inside and 36 outside. "We believe that the Ahwatukee area and I-10 & Ray Road , in particular, is one of the top trade areas in Greater Phoenix. We are excited to bring Snooze to this area and think this is an engaging and exciting community for us to get involved in." Breakfast and brunch concepts are a popular and growing segment of the restaurant industry. Steven covers retail, restaurants, hospitality/tourism as well as aviation, small business and nonprofits.
